entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Prince Albert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Albert Airport 10:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -15.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -18.2°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
